trans-unit.source: htmlArea RTE is a free, open-source, ExtJS-based editor for <textarea> fields featuring tight integration with TYPO3.
trans-unit.target: htmlArea RTE is a free, open-source, ExtJS-based editor for <textarea> fields featuring tight integration with TYPO3.

trans-unit.source: htmlArea RTE supports the following browsers: Firefox 1.5+, SeaMonkey 1.0+, Safari 3.0.4+, Google Chrome 1.0+ and Opera 9.62+ on any platform, and Internet Explorer 6.0+ on Windows.
trans-unit.target: htmlArea RTE supports the following browsers: Firefox 1.5+, SeaMonkey 1.0+, Safari 3.0.4+, Google Chrome 1.0+ and Opera 9.62+ on any platform, and Internet Explorer 6.0+ on Windows.

trans-unit.source: BE User settings let you specify some options of the RTE.
trans-unit.target: BE User settings let you specify some options of the RTE.

trans-unit.source: Default width of the RTE in px or %
trans-unit.target: Default width of the RTE in px or %

trans-unit.source: This option lets you specify the initial width of the RTE.
trans-unit.target: This option lets you specify the initial width of the RTE.

trans-unit.source: The option specifies the width of the RTE when it is initially displayed. The width may be specified as a fixed number of pixels or as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: The option specifies the width of the RTE when it is initially displayed. The width may be specified as a fixed number of pixels or as a percentage.

trans-unit.source: Default height of the RTE in px
trans-unit.target: Default height of the RTE in px

trans-unit.source: This option lets you specify the initial height of the RTE.
trans-unit.target: This option lets you specify the initial height of the RTE.

trans-unit.source: The option specifies the height of the RTE when it is initially displayed. The height of the RTE must be specified as a fixed number of pixels not as a percentage. The value you set should allow sufficient height for the tool bar, the editing area and the status bar of the RTE.
trans-unit.target: The option specifies the height of the RTE when it is initially displayed. The height of the RTE must be specified as a fixed number of pixels not as a percentage. The value you set should allow sufficient height for the tool bar, the editing area and the status bar of the RTE.

trans-unit.source: This option will make RTE-enabled fields resizable. A resize handle will appear at the bottom right corner of the RTE.
trans-unit.target: This option will make RTE-enabled fields resizable. A resize handle will appear at the bottom right corner of the RTE.

trans-unit.source: Maximal height of resizable RTE in pixels
trans-unit.target: Maximal height of resizable RTE in pixels

trans-unit.source: The value you set should allow sufficient height for the tool bar, the editing area and the status bar of the RTE. Default value is 2000.
trans-unit.target: The value you set should allow sufficient height for the tool bar, the editing area and the status bar of the RTE. Default value is 2000.
